entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 1:04PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Near Freezing Temperatures Tonight... As skies clear this afternoon and evening, cold temperatures will develop tonight. entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 7:14PM MST by NWS
entry.summary: ...A line of thunderstorms with blowing dust will impact portions of Coconino County through 745 PM MST... At 712 PM MST, the public reported blowing dust near Cameron moving toward Highway 89 ahead of a line of thunderstorms. Gusty winds, blowing dust with lowered visibility, and torrential rain can all be expected.
